actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives concerning the expenditure of money appropriated by the Congress for the Bicentennial celebration.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that any money appropriated for the purpose of celebrating the Bicentennial should only be spent to honor and celebrate the History of this Nation and the people of the United States.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives concerning the expenditure of money appropriated by the Congress for the Bicentennial celebration.
